item.title: Service Request Load Testing for SCSM
item.description: I have found a great for load testing SCSM with Incidents and copy here. The script uses SMLets to generate Incidents and you can then gauge how your system would handle the load you are planning within your Production Environment.

item.description: I have previously done a post on Cireson IT Asset Management. However the people at Cireson have been very busy with new features to be added to their ITAM (IT Asset Management) tool.
